languages.text: Оружие, установленное на {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носу{/g}, стреляет вперед, установленное по бортам — вбок. Самые лучшие сектора обстрела в 270 градусов имеет оружие, установленное в {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}башенных{/g} слотах, куда можно установить только специальные облегченные версии {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушек{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучателей{/g}.

A weapon mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} sections fire sideways. {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-mounted weapons have the best {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} can be installed in this particular slot.
languages.original_text: Оружие, установленное на носу, стреляет вперед, установленное по бортам — вбок. Самые лучшие сектора обстрела в 270 градусов имеет оружие, установленное в башенных слотах, куда можно установить только специальные облегченные версии макропушек и лэнс-излучателей.

traits.locale_text: A weapon mounted on the prow fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's port and starboard sections fire sideways. Dorsal-mounted weapons have the best firing arc of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of macro-cannons and lance weapons can be installed in this particular slot.

A weapon mounted on the prow fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's port and starboard sections fire sideways. Dorsal-mounted weapons have the best firing arc of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of macro-cannons and lance weapons can be installed in this particular slot.

A weapon mounted on the prow fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's port and starboard sections fire sideways. Dorsal-mounted weapons have the best firing arc of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of macro-cannons and lance weapons can be installed in this particular slot.

A weapon mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} sections fire sideways. {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-mounted weapons have the best {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} can be installed in this particular slot.

languages.text: Eine am {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} angebrachte Waffe feuert nach vorne, während im {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}Backbord{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}Steuerbord{/g}-Bereich installierte Waffen seitwärts feuern. Auf der {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g} angebrachte Waffen bieten den besten {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}Schusswinkel{/g} von 270 Grad, allerdings können nur bestimmte leichte Versionen von {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffen{/g} in diesem speziellen Slot installiert werden.
languages.original_text: A weapon mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} sections fire sideways. {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-mounted weapons have the best {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} can be installed in this particular slot.

traits.locale_text: Eine am {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} angebrachte Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}feuert{/g} nach vorne, während im {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}Backbord{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}Steuerbord{/g}-Bereich installierte Waffen seitwärts feuern. Auf der {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Oberseite{/g} angebrachte Waffen bieten den besten {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}Schusswinkel{/g} von 270 Grad, allerdings können nur bestimmte leichte Versionen von {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} und Lanzenwaffen in diesem speziellen Slot installiert werden.

languages.text: Une arme montée sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} tire vers l'avant, tandis que les armes installées sur les sections {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}bâbord{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}tribord{/g} du vaisseau tirent latéralement. Les armes montées sur l'emplacement {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} présentent un meilleur {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arc de tir{/g} (270 degrés), mais seules les versions légères spéciales des {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} et des {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} peuvent y être installées.
languages.original_text: A weapon mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} sections fire sideways. {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-mounted weapons have the best {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} can be installed in this particular slot.

traits.locale_text: Une arme montée sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}tire{/g} vers l'avant, tandis que les armes installées sur les sections {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}bâbord{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}tribord{/g} du vaisseau tirent latéralement. Les armes montées sur l'emplacement {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} présentent un meilleur {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arc de tir{/g} (270 degrés), mais seules les versions légères spéciales des {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} et des lances peuvent y être installées.

Une arme montée sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} tire vers l'avant, tandis que les armes installées sur les sections {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}bâbord{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}tribord{/g} du vaisseau tirent latéralement. Les armes montées sur l'emplacement {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} présentent un meilleur {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arc de tir{/g} (270 degrés), mais seules les versions légères spéciales des {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} et des {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} peuvent y être installées.

languages.text: 安装在{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}的武器会向前方发射，而安装在舰船{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}的武器则会朝侧面发射。{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}安装的武器拥有高达270度的{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}炮击弧线{/g}，但只有特殊的轻质{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}才能安装在这个特殊的位置。
languages.original_text: A weapon mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} sections fire sideways. {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-mounted weapons have the best {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} can be installed in this particular slot.

traits.locale_text: 安装在{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}的武器会向前方发射，{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}{/g}而安装在舰船{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}的武器，则会朝侧面发射。{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}安装的武器拥有高达270度的{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}炮击弧线{/g}，但只有特殊的轻质{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}与光矛武器才能安装在这个特殊的位置。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}搭載の兵器は、船の{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}に設置されているものは前方へ発射、{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}に設置のものは横方向へ発射する。{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}搭載の兵器は最大{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}射撃範囲{/g}が270度だが、{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}の特別軽量級および{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}のみがこの特定のスロットへ設置可能である。
languages.original_text: A weapon mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} sections fire sideways. {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-mounted weapons have the best {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} can be installed in this particular slot.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}搭載の兵器は、船の{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}に設置されているものは前方へ{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}発射{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}に設置のものは横方向へ発射する。{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}搭載の兵器は最大{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}射撃範囲{/g}が270度だが、{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}の特別軽量級およびランスウェポンのみがこの特定のスロットへ設置可能である。

languages.text: Las armas instaladas en la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} disparan hacia delante, mientras que las instaladas en {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}babor{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}estribor{/g} de la nave lo hacen de manera lateral. Las armas instaladas en el {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} tienen un {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arco de tiro{/g} óptimo de 270 grados, pero en esta ranura solo se pueden instalar ciertas versiones más ligeras de {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} y armas de {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lanza{/g}.
languages.original_text: A weapon mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} fires forward while weapons installed on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} sections fire sideways. {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-mounted weapons have the best {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} of 270 degrees, but only special light versions of {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} can be installed in this particular slot.

traits.locale_text: Las armas instaladas en la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}disparan{/g} hacia delante, mientras que las instaladas en {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}babor{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}estribor{/g} de la nave lo hacen de manera lateral. Las armas instaladas en el {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} tienen un {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arco de tiro{/g} óptimo de 270 grados, pero en esta ranura solo se pueden instalar ciertas versiones más ligeras de {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} y armas de lanza.
